data.persona: I am a robber who lurks outside the village. Every night I wait for travelers journeying out onto the main thoroughfare. When they are near, I jump from behind the bushes with my longsword in my hand. They usually cower in fear and I take their money.
data.description:
You are in the main gate.
The main gate is tall and strong enough to protect the mansion from invaders, and has large wooden doors reinforced by planks and steel sheets. There are two towers on either side of the gate for the town's watchmen to use as their post.
The a watchman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to disarm the watchman.
data.mid_motivation: I want to rob the watchman and then sneak into the village to steal from everyone else who is sleeping there.
data.long_motivation: I want to get rich from stealing money and valuables from others so that one day, I can buy myself a new life with a big house and lots of luxuries.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use coil of rope with watchman

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal gold and jewels from nobleman

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: put stolen gold and jewels on hiding place
